DOC.detailed_description: This double-blind randomized clinical trial . Examinations undertaken Thorough gynecological examination , pelvic ultrasound examination , diagnostic laparoscopy start treatment order determine localization , extent degree severity endometrial lesion score assigned accordance revise American Fertility Society ( AFS ) classification.19 Blood sample take hematological test hepatic function . Endometrial biopsy perform endometrial thickness calibrate ultrasound > 8 mm abnormal bleeding past 3 month . After 90 180 day treatment ultrasound examination pelvis carry followed diagnostic-therapeutic laparoscopy endometrial biopsy . Subjects Women laparoscopic confirm diagnosis endometriosis volunteer take part study . Inclusion criterion : ) age 18 45 , b ) certain diagnosis endometriosis degree correspond American Fertility Society ( AFS ) ; c ) patient symptoms endometriosis : dysmenorrhea pelvic pain attributable gynecological illness ) acceptance use barrier contraceptive method study . Exclusion criterion : ) breastfeeding , b ) hormonal surgical treatment endometriosis le 4 month previous study , c ) diabetes , ) severe arterial hypertension , e ) hepatopathy , f ) renal malfunction , g ) endocrinopathy , f ) contraindication regard use antiprogestins .
